casebody.data:
No. 11-8. MIG, Inc., fka Metromedia International Group, Inc., Petitioner v. Paul, Weiss, Rifkind, Wharton & Garrison, L.L.P. 565 U.S. 878, 132 S. Ct. 241,

181 L. Ed. 2d 137,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 5473. October 3, 2011.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit denied.

Same case below, 410 Fed. Appx. 408.
